data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

While you are facing forward, every step you take makes you go forward and forward are repeated. If you take 9 steps left, you go left 6 times, or that is backwards 1 step per step of your total steps. If you take 9 steps right, you go right 6 times or that is backwards 2 steps per step of your total steps. All actions in one sentence make a whole. So, the answer is yes.

To turn around, it is best to be facing in the direction you came from. Therefore, the answer is Yes.
